com.tokelon.toktales.core.render.opengl.gl20

Interface IGL12

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGL

    public interface IGL12
extends IGL
    OGL2 v1.2 definition of OpenGL CompatWrapper.

    Credit to LWJGL (https://www.lwjgl.org) which was used as the base.
